Name: Fine & Dandy
Ingredients: 5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix) optional
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A Gin Sour sweetened with orange liqueur. Harry Craddock 's original 1930 recipe calls for 1 part lemon, 1 part triple sec, and 2 parts gin. Depending on your lemons, this tends to produce an overly sour cocktail, hence I've reduced the citrus and added a touch of sugar.
History: Adapted from a recipe in Harry Craddock's 1930 The Savoy Cocktail Book .
Nutrition: One serving of Fine & Dandy contains 169 calories
